original_title: Mike Oldfield - The Millennium Bell, Live in Berlin
overview: Berlin welcomes the new millennium with the largest lighting event in the world and a captivating live concert by superstar Mike Oldfield.  At the Siegessaule Square on December 31, 1999, Mike Oldfield plays Moonlight Shadow and the complete Millennium Bell.
title: Mike Oldfield - The Millennium Bell, Live in Berlin
